SEARCH

Class KitchenScene

java.lang.Object
GameScene
KitchenScene
public class KitchenScene extends GameScene
Represents the kitchen scene.

In this scene, the pet can purchase food using coins. The food will be brought into the inventory, where the pet can eat the food. The pet's stats will be updated based on the food purchased and eaten.

  • Constructor Details

    • KitchenScene

      public KitchenScene(ScreenManager screenManager, Pet pet)
      Creates a kitchen scene.

      In this scene, the pet can purchase food using coins. The food will be brought into the inventory, where the pet can eat the food. The pet's stats will be updated based on the food purchased and eaten.

      Parameters:
      screenManager - the screen manager that manages screen transitions
      pet - the pet object

    • onEnter

      public void onEnter()
      Represents the events that occur when the scene is entered.

      On scene entry, all UI elements are brought from the previous scene to maintain consistency. Additionally, the stat decrease timer will start. If there are any buttons that require a condition to work, this method also checks for that condition. It updates the buttons clickablility and the pet's states accordingly.

      Overrides:
      onEnter in class GameScene

    • onTimerTick

      public void onTimerTick()
      Represents the events that occur after every few seconds.

      Every few seconds, the pet's stats besides health will decrease. Additionally, the pet will gain coins. The pet's states and UI will be updated accordingly.

      Overrides:
      onTimerTick in class GameScene

    • onSleepTick

      public void onSleepTick()
      Represents the events that occur when the pet is sleeping.

      This timer is called when the pet starts sleeping, and is no longer called when the pet stops sleeping. This timer will continuously check if the pet is still sleeping, and if so, will increase the pet's energy value. If not, the gameplay buttons will be enabled again, assuming all other conditions are met.

      Overrides:
      onSleepTick in class GameScene

    • onAngryTick

      public void onAngryTick()
      Represents the events that occur when the pet is angry.

      This timer is called when the pet is angry, and is no longer called when the pet is no longer angry. This timer will continuously check if the pet is still angry. If not, the gameplay buttons will be enabled again, assuming all other conditions are met.

      Overrides:
      onAngryTick in class GameScene

    • updatePetState

      protected void updatePetState()
      Updates the pet's states upon every stat increase or decrease.

      If the pet is dead, all buttons besides settings are no longer functional. If the pet is angry, all buttons that don't increase happiness are not functional. If the pet is sleeping, all buttons besides settings are no longer functional, and the pet will receive a health penalty. If the pet is hungry, they will lose health and happiness over time.

      Overrides:
      updatePetState in class GameScene
